basics.name: Sean Tsikteris
basics.label: PhD Student
basics.summary: A PhD student in Computer Engineering, performing research in RL-agent environments at Arizona State University.

work.name: School of Electrical, Computer and Energy Engineering, Arizona State University
U.S Army DEVCOM Army Research Laboratory
work.summary: Collaborative research with The University of New Mexico, DEVCOM Army Research Laboratory, and National Science Foundation (NSF) in autonomous systems navigation.

work.name: Department of Computer and Electrical Engineering, University of New Mexico
University of New Mexico School of Engineering - COSMIAC
work.summary: At COSMIAC, a research center part of the University of New Mexico School of Engineering, I was a designated Research Engineer working with external entities and collaborators on various projects with a variety of objectives. In specific, I worked with Positioning, Navigation, and Timing (PNT), Printed Circuit Board Design (PCB), and Field Programmable Gate Arrays (FPGAs).
